landing_head_subtitle: Payve is an open source tool that allows groups of people to easily manage their finances and settle debts between them.
error_username_invalid: Username is invalid, allowed characters are a-z, A-Z, 0-9, and _
error_username_too_short: Username is too short, minimum length is 3
error_username_too_long: Username is too long, maximum length is 24
error_password_too_short: Password is too short, minimum length is 7
error_password_too_long: Password is too long, maximum length is 96
error_display_name_too_long: Display name is too long, maximum length is 96
error_group_name_too_long: Group name is too long, maximum length is 48
error_group_currency_invalid_format: Currency is invalid, must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code
error_group_currency_not_supported: Currency is not supported, supported currencies are: EUR, USD, DKK
